name: Plasma Dog
description:
Plasma Dog is a 2D Platformer that gives players True Ownership of in-game assets to palyers. Each token the player collects and achievement they unlock is deposited into the player's  Ethereum wallet .  Players are then free to do whatever they want with these rare digital assets - sell, buy, rent, collect, or trade them. Read here to learn more about the technical underbelly of Plasma Dog.

This game is a proof-of-concept of Hoard's SDK, which enables any game to create rare, digital assets for their players. It also enables new game-to-game interoperability so digital worlds can build on each other.
